author: Jon Zamora
description:
The target is not the people suffering the disease, but the ones wih th epower to fight it. I mean monetary and political power to really fight the Ebola.

Until the most powerful countries watch the necessity to help and find a vaccum against the dissease there will not be much change in the topic.

We need to create a social alarm to make the people react, and to enable a serious research and development in the topic´s issues.
